Uses of Interface
view.View

  • Packages that use View 
    Package Description
    controller
    In this Package we have the controller
    view
    In this Package we have the View, its Factory and its implementating variants

    • Uses of View in controller

      Methods in controller with parameters of type View 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Controller.run(View view, Model model)
      The Method to combine the layers of model and view

      Implementation of the View Interface.

      Implementation of the View Interface.
      class  TextViewImplementation
      Implementation of the View Interface.

      Method to obtain a view of the Implemented type chosen in the view.properties file
